full_text.full_text:
Data Mining
▪ The process of extracting useful information from large data sets
▪ Data mining blends traditional data analysis methods with 
sophisticated algorithms for processing this abundance of data
– (ex) traditional statistics + the latest big data technology
▪ There are many applications that require more advanced 
techniques for data mining
